issue.title: [C++] Add write support for ORC in the Datasets API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13796](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13796). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-13572 (https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10991) added basic support for ORC file format in the Datasets API, but didn't yet add support to write datasets to the ORC format.
